name: Arigato
description:
Out of all the people in this boring world, Nikki Makoto is the one that stands out. Along with Soro Niden and Tayada Sakura, Nikki fights to escape this broken place..

Our Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=965324478

This project will be updated every week or every two days. If you
encounter any bits that don't work please contact me and I will try to
fix the problem. If you like the game, have suggestions or want to work
on it too please comment.

Arigato was made with RPGmaker VX                                                                                     

GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/ari...
